a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Coal prices of various production locations are measured in US dollars per tonne. This data is not adjusted for
Japan coking coal import CIF price
Japan steam coal import CIF price
Data source: Energy Institute based on S&P Global Platts - Statistical Review of World Energy (2023)
